data.title: URBN POSTS JOB OPENINGS FOR NEW DISTRIBUTION CENTER
data.meta_description: Even from the highway adjacent to the Windy Ridge site in White Township, drivers can see daily progress on th...
data.text:
Even from the highway adjacent to the Windy Ridge site in White Township, drivers can see daily progress on the 892,000 square foot URBN fulfillment center. The company expects to have the massive building ready to go in early August, and yesterday it went live with a job posting seeking fifty workers.

PA Careerlink forwarded the information yesterday. URBN’s posting reads, “Career Opportunities: Urban Outfitters Inc. Material Handler”. The job will pay $12.60 per hour to start, with two shifts working seven days a week.

The distribution center will eventually build to an estimated 225 employees, handling the company’s furniture line. The company has already been hiring managers who will handle the interviews and hiring of the workforce.

HERE IS THE LINK TO URBN’S JOB POSTING:

Career Opportunities: Urban Outfitters Inc. Material Handler – Indiana, PA (92058)

Job Posting ID 92058 – Posted 05/15/2019 – URBN – Distribution – Pennsylvania.

https://career4.successfactors.com/sfcareer/jobreqcareer?jobId=92058&company=URBN&username=

THE JOB DESCRIPTION:

Urban Outfitters, Inc. (www.URBN.com) is an innovative specialty retailer which offers a variety of lifestyle merchandise to highly defined customer niches through brands in­cluding Urban Outfitters, Anthropologie, Free People, Terrain, and BHLDN. Urban Outfitters, Inc., is both a Fortune 1000 and S&P 500 ranked company with $2.5 Billion in revenues.
